com.jakewharton.android.actionbarsherlock
Interface ActionBarSherlock.MenuHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
ActionBarSherlock.NativeActionBarHandler
Enclosing class:
ActionBarSherlock
public static interface ActionBarSherlock.MenuHandler

Interface which denotes a third-party action bar handler implementation supports populating the action bar from an XML menu.

Method Summary
 void setMenuResourceId(int menuResourceId)
          Populate the action bar with items from an XML menu.
 

Method Detail

setMenuResourceId

void setMenuResourceId(int menuResourceId)

Populate the action bar with items from an XML menu.

A convenience method, ActionBarSherlock.ActionBarHandler.inflateMenu(int), is available which will perform the inflation and return an ActionBarMenu.

Parameters:
menuResourceId - Resource ID of menu XML.
